name: Trading Opportunities Using Financial Modelling & Algorithmic Trading
content: National Stock Exchange of India-Academy & Greater Vision are pleased to extend a warm welcome to you to the Executive Training Program on ‘Trading Opportunities Using Financial Modelling & Algorithmic Trading’ to be organized in the beautiful city of Chennai - India from November 20-24, 2018\. For more details please visit: www.globalbizresearch.org E-Mail: training@globalbizresearch.org Website: http://globalbizresearch.org/training/
organizers: National Stock Exchange of India Ltd - Academy & Greater Vision Conferences & Seminars
